page.title: 05NEW HORIZONS IN EPPING
page.content: If you are over{sixty}and{retired you won't feel old if you join the New Horizons at{Epping's Sports {Centre:}you will have lots of fun. The Sports Centre opened in 1970 and New Horizons began in November 1984. The oldest person attending the group is{91. Activities in New Horizons include bowls,badminton and keep fit. People who go like to meet friends.70 people attend in Epping. There are 45 part-time and 6 full-time staff at the Centre. Disabled people in wheel chairs cannot get into the Sports Centre because there are steps and too many doors. The old people in Epping have changed into Supergrans and Supergrandads since this new scheme opened. {"Friendship and fun}are what we have found here," said one member.
